data.text: Nayi, siyane ɛ tinxinna toma nɛn
Ɛ findima nɛn manga kɔmɔti mayilenxin na Alatala yii,
A mi fa falama ɛ ma sɔnɔn,
Ɛ diine ɛ yamanan masuxuma nɛn
Yerusalɛn kaane, n bata kantan tiine dɔxɔ ɛ taan makantan yinna xuntagi,
Alatala bata a kɔlɔ a yiifanna nun a sɛnbɛ gbeeni, a naxa,
Ɛ a mato, Alatala a xuiin naminima
